summary: Interactive, responsive web-based digital Valentine’s letter with an envelope opening animation, playful Yes/No buttons (No runs away), and a replaceable video that plays with sound when Yes is clicked.
architectural_notes: Target modern web browsers; implement responsive/touch-friendly interactions (mouse + touch) with smooth, lightweight animations.

Incorporate a handwritten love-letter aesthetic: warm soft palette, romantic typography, subtle paper/parchment texture, and small heart/floral decorative accents while keeping the UI readable and responsive.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Seamless parchment paper texture, warm cream tone with subtle fiber/grain (parchment-texture.dim_2000x2000.png)
- Tiny heart doodle accent, minimal line-art, warm red/rose (heart-doodle-accent.dim_256x256.png)
- Small floral corner accent, delicate line-art, warm rose/gold (floral-corner-accent.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create a single-page interactive Valentine’s letter UI with a front page that has a solid pink background and displays the text “To my dear Kanmani” in a black cursive-style font; clicking/tapping anywhere on the front page (or the envelope element) must transition to the opened letter view.
Implement an envelope opening animation that smoothly reveals the message text “Will you be mine, Valentine Kanmani?” and then displays two buttons labeled “Yes” and “No”.

Add playful interactivity to the “No” button so that when a user tries to hover it (mouse) or approach/tap it (touch), the button moves away within the visible container, making it difficult (but not impossible) to click.
Make the “Yes” button trigger playback of a user-supplied video with sound, with a smooth transition from the letter/buttons view to the video player view.

Provide an integrated, easy video replacement/upload option in the UI so the user can select a local video file to be used for the “Yes” playback; the selected video should be used immediately without requiring a backend upload.

Ensure the entire experience is fully responsive and touch-friendly across laptop/tablet/phone screen sizes, including appropriately sized tap targets, readable typography, and layout that adapts to portrait and landscape orientations.
Optimize animations and transitions (envelope opening, button motion, view transitions) to remain lightweight and smooth, avoiding heavy effects that cause lag on modern browsers.

Apply a coherent, creative visual theme appropriate for a Valentine’s letter (colors, typography pairing, spacing, and component styling) and enforce it consistently across the front page, letter/envelope view, buttons, and video view (avoid blue/purple as primary colors).

Update the Valentine letter UI visual design to feel like a heartfelt handwritten love letter: warm, soft colors; elegant romantic handwriting-style fonts; visually appealing cozy layout; gentle parchment/paper textures; and subtle decorative accents (tiny hearts or floral elements) across the front page, envelope/letter, message card, buttons, and video view.

Add static parchment/paper texture and subtle decorative accent artwork as generated image assets, store them under frontend/public/assets/generated, and render them in the UI to support the handwritten love-letter aesthetic (without using the backend to serve or transform images).

Ensure the video selection and playback flow clearly supports a user-provided ~31-second video: the UI should communicate that a short (e.g., 31s) video can be used, and the video playback should play with sound and end naturally (no forced looping).

new_feature_requests.summary: Front page with pink background and black cursive text “To my dear Kanmani”, clickable to open envelope/letter
Envelope opening animation that reveals the message “Will you be mine, Valentine Kanmani?”
Display Yes/No buttons after reveal; No button playfully runs away on hover/tap to avoid being clicked
Yes button triggers playback of a user-supplied video with sound
Integrate an easy video replacement/upload option for the Yes-button video
Ensure full responsiveness and touch-friendly interactions across laptop/tablet/phone with smooth transitions and lightweight performance
Update letter visual design to feel like a heartfelt handwritten love letter (warm soft colors, romantic/elegant fonts, parchment/paper texture, subtle hearts/floral accents, cozy intimate layout)
